title: Multi-resolution Ridge Top Flatness
description: A topographic index designed to identify high flat areas at a range of scales
attribution: For Ridge Top Flatness: John Gallant; Trevor Dowling; Jenet Austin (2013): Multi-resolution Ridge Top Flatness (MrRTF, 3" resolution). v1. CSIRO. Data Collection. 10.4225/08/512EEA6332EEB
